question: Which city among the following has been selected by the United Nations as the data hub for the Middle East North Africa and South Asia (MENASA) region?
explanation: Dubai has been named the Local Data Hub for the Middle East, North Africa and South Asia (MENASA) region by the United Nations for the city's integrated initiatives to mine and manage its data. The General Secretariat of the Dubai Executive Council and the World Council on City Data (WCCD) are currently in discussions to sign a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) that would confirm the designation.
